problem.title: CheckPoint: Collision
problem.script: ma=random.choice([50,60,70]) va=random.choice([2.0,3.0,4.0]) mb=random.choice([30,40,50]) vb=random.choice([0.4,0.8,1.2]) v=(- mb* vb+ ma*( va+2.0))/ mb
problem.p: Two skaters, Alan and Betsy, move toward each other on a very smooth skating rink. Their masses and speeds are respectively: $ma kg; $va m/s and $mb kg; $vb m/s. After the skaters collide and use their hands to push each other away, Alan is moving backwards at 2.0 m/s. Taking the direction of Alan's initial velocity as positive, find Betsy's velocity \(v_f\) after the collision.
